title: ZestMoney’s offline gamble: Can it take on biggies like Bajaj Finance in a cut-throat industry?
text:
ZestMoney hopes to emerge as an alternative to credit cards in India with its ‘virtual’ business model, offering financing at the online merchant checkout that can be paid through EMIs. It’s now eyeing an offline foray as well with a model similar to that of Bajaj Finance. But taking on the biggies would be a stiff challenge.
